summary: An ordinance appropriating money from the City Railway Fund to Lillian Agnes Nelson, in payment of claim for personal injuries, File No. 147986, and directing the City Comptroller to cancel warrant in the sum of Fifty Dollars ($50.00) on the City Railway Fund, drawn in favor of Lillian Agnes Nelson, under authority of Ordinance No. 66857, and repealing that portion of Ordinance No. 66857 appropriating Fifty Dollars ($50.00) to Lillian Agnes Nelson.
